verses.verse: The book <WG976> of the genealogy <WG1078> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> the son <WG5207> of David, <WG7035> the son <WG5207> of Abraham. <WG11>
To Abraham <WG11> was born <WG1080> Isaac; <WG2464> and to Isaac, <WG2464> Jacob; <WG2384> and to Jacob, <WG2384> Judah <WG2455> and his brothers; <WG80>
and to Judah <WG2455> were born <WG1080> Perez <WG5329> and Zerah <WG2196> by Tamar; <WG2283> and to Perez <WG5329> was born <WG1080> Hezron; <WG2074> and to Hezron, <WG2074> Ram; <WG689>
and to Ram <WG689> was born <WG1080> Amminadab; <WG284> and to Amminadab, <WG284> Nahshon; <WG3476> and to Nahshon, <WG3476> Salmon; <WG4533>
and to Salmon <WG4533> was born <WG1080> Boaz <WG1003> by Rahab; <WG4460> and to Boaz <WG1003> was born <WG1080> Obed <WG7098> by Ruth; <WG4503> and to Obed, <WG7098> Jesse; <WG2421>
and to Jesse <WG2421> was born <WG1080> David <WG7035> the king. <WG935> And to David <WG7035> was born <WG1080> Solomon <WG4672> by her [who had been the wife] of Uriah; <WG3774>
and to Solomon <WG4672> was born <WG1080> Rehoboam; <WG4497> and to Rehoboam, <WG4497> Abijah; and to Abijah, Asa; <WG7>
and to Asa <WG760> was born <WG1080> Jehoshaphat; <WG2498> and to Jehoshaphat, <WG2498> Joram; <WG2496> and to Joram, <WG2496> Uzziah; <WG3604>
and to Uzziah <WG3604> was born <WG1080> Jotham; <WG2488> and to Jotham, <WG2488> Ahaz; <WG881> and to Ahaz, <WG881> Hezekiah; <WG1478>
and to Hezekiah <WG1478> was born <WG1080> Manasseh; <WG3128> and to Manasseh, <WG3128> Amon; <WG300> and to Amon, <WG300> Josiah; <WG2502>
and to Josiah <WG2502> were born <WG1080> Jeconiah <WG2423> and his brothers, <WG80> at the time <WG1909> of the deportation <WG3350> to Babylon. <WG897>
And after <WG3326> the deportation <WG3350> to Babylon, <WG897> to Jeconiah <WG2423> was born <WG1080> Shealtiel; <WG4528> and to Shealtiel, <WG4528> Zerubbabel; <WG2216>
and to Zerubbabel <WG2216> was born <WG1080> Abihud; <WG10> and to Abihud, <WG10> Eliakim; <WG1662> and to Eliakim, <WG1662> Azor; <WG107>
and to Azor <WG107> was born <WG1080> Zadok; <WG4524> and to Zadok, <WG4524> Achim; <WG885> and to Achim, <WG885> Eliud; <WG1664>
and to Eliud <WG1664> was born <WG1080> Eleazar; <WG1648> and to Eleazar, <WG1648> Matthan; <WG3102> and to Matthan, <WG3102> Jacob; <WG2384>
and to Jacob <WG2384> was born <WG1080> Joseph <WG2501> the husband <WG435> of Mary, <WG3137> by whom <WG3739> was born <WG1080> Jesus, <WG2424> who is called <WG3004> Christ. <WG5547>

Therefore <WG3767> all <WG3956> the generations <WG1074> from Abraham <WG11> to David <WG7035> are fourteen <WG1180> generations; <WG1074> and from David <WG7035> to the deportation <WG3350> to Babylon <WG897> fourteen <WG1180> generations; <WG1074> and from the deportation <WG3350> to Babylon <WG897> to [the time of] Christ <WG5547> fourteen <WG1180> generations. <WG1074>

Now <WG1161> the birth <WG1078> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> was as follows. <WG3779> When His mother <WG3384> Mary <WG3137> had been betrothed <WG3423> to Joseph, <WG2501> before <WG4250> they came <WG4905> together <WG4905> she was found <WG2147> to be with child <WG1722> <WG1064> by the Holy <WG40> Spirit. <WG4151>

And Joseph <WG2501> her husband, <WG435> being <WG1510> a righteous <WG1342> man, <WG1342> and not wanting <WG2309> to disgrace <WG1165> her, desired <WG1014> to put <WG630> her away <WG630> secretly. <WG2977>

But when he had considered <WG1760> this, <WG3778> behold, <WG2400> an angel <WG32> of the Lord <WG2962> appeared <WG5316> to him in a dream, <WG3677> saying, <WG3004> "Joseph, <WG2501> son <WG5207> of David, <WG7035> do not be afraid <WG5399> to take <WG3880> Mary <WG3137> as your wife; <WG1135> for that which has been conceived <WG1080> in her is of the Holy <WG40> Spirit. <WG4151>
"And she will bear <WG5088> a Son; <WG5207> and you shall call <WG2564> His name <WG3686> Jesus, <WG2424> for it is He who will save <WG4982> His people <WG2992> from their sins. <WG266>"

Now <WG1161> all <WG3650> this <WG3778> took <WG1096> place <WG1096> that what <WG3588> was spoken <WG3004> by the Lord <WG2962> through <WG1223> the prophet <WG4396> might be fulfilled, <WG4137> saying, <WG3004>

"Behold, <WG2400> the virgin <WG3933> shall be with child, <WG1722> <WG1064> and shall bear <WG5088> a Son, <WG5207> and they shall call <WG2564> His name <WG3686> Immanuel, <WG1694>" which <WG3739> translated <WG3177> means, <WG1510> "God <WG2316> with us."
And Joseph <WG2501> arose <WG1453> from his sleep, <WG5258> and did <WG4160> as the angel <WG32> of the Lord <WG2962> commanded <WG4367> him, and took <WG3880> [her] as his wife, <WG1135>
and kept <WG3756> <WG1097> her a virgin <WG3756> <WG1097> until <WG2193> she gave <WG5088> birth <WG5088> to a Son; <WG5207> and he called <WG2564> His name <WG3686> Jesus. <WG2424>
